body_html: Good point. Though I have not checked my input data this way but I am quite sure that at every new training phase it is picking up a shuffled order of the same input. But should this matter? If I have a set of input X for training or testing then for any permutation of X shouldn't I get nearly same error/accuracy? Or I am misinterpreting your explanation @amadupu
